name: Inter OpenType playground
description:
Examples that you can play with to explore Inter’s OpenType features. Hold ⌘ (or ctrl) while clicking to select text objects directly.

To explore font features in Figma:
1. Select one of the text boxes in the examples below.
2. Click the ••• button in the text panel on your right ->
3. Find the feature listed under the rubrics below.

If you do not have the latest Inter fonts installed on your computer, please install a recent version from https://github.com/rsms/inter/releases/latest
